data.name: High Elo Girls
data.detailed_description:
FEATURING:

  • 5 MMG Team Roles to Play (Top Lane, Jungle, Mid Lane, DPS, and Support)
  • 5 MMG Teammates to Befriend, Romance, or Antagonize
  • MOBA Simulations featuring crucial narrative-changing choices
  • A newcomer-friendly tour of the MOBA esports scene

Navigate competition from all directions to become starter for your new esports team!


High Elo Girls is an esports visual novel about embracing your dreams to become stronger. Play as Rafaela, a college dropout turned substitute for Momentum Gaming (MMG), an ambitious team of five amateur players competing for a coveted spot in a closed esports league. Become an MMG starter by navigating fraught relationships with your new team members, or take a backseat to their ambitions.

Will you find purpose in friendship or victory?



High Elo Girls is an esports visual novel about embracing hopes and dreams.
Taking place over 12 weeks, this tale of teamwork explores themes of new adulthood, team relationships, and the heights reached when we embrace the climb.

Wishlist us today and look forward to development updates in 2022!
✨ The Split Fate Team

data.short_description: High Elo Girls is a coming-of-age Visual Novel set in the esports scene. You play as the latest recruit for a new all-girls team. Can you help your squad achieve their true potential, or will you only squander your own?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista or Above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or DirectX 9

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10
  • Processor: DirectX or OpenGL
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 or Above
  • Processor: OpenGL 2 or DirectX 9
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
